name: Fried Cream Salad
steps: In a bowl, season the cream cheese with salt and pepper to taste.
Shape the cream cheese into small balls or any desired shape.
In separate bowls, place the flour, beaten eggs, and bread crumbs.
Coat each cream cheese ball with flour, then dip into the beaten eggs, and roll in bread crumbs to coat evenly.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep frying pan or pot over medium heat.
Carefully place the coated cream cheese balls into the hot oil and fry until golden brown and crispy.
Remove the fried cream cheese balls from the oil and drain on paper towels to remove excess oil.
In a serving plate, arrange mixed salad greens, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber slices.
Place the fried cream cheese balls on top of the salad.
Serve the fried cream salad as a delightful appetizer or side dish.
